page.title: 03Social Care in Halesowen
page.content: The Lutley Centre for Partially sighted starts on Tuesday morning and finishes at 3 o'clock. They have partially registered blind and 20 people attend the centre. The Brett Young centre and the Queensway community centre are open every day for old people have a cooked meal and entertainment. Halesowen C of E Nursery is for the 3-5 age range, 45 children attend. Tenterfields school also has a nursery. In total, 105 children have a Nursery education in Halesowen. Bundle Hill youth centre caters for the 12-18 age group. It is open from 6-10 pm. Several activities are available there.
